title: Did the Stickers on the Pipe-Bombing Suspect’s Van Inexplicably Change After His Arrest?
subtitle: Social media users speculated that something nefarious was behind apparent changes in the displays of pro-Trump stickers on Cesar Sayoc's confiscated van.
author: David Emery
vclaim: Photographs and video of pipe-bombing suspect Cesar Sayoc's van taken during and after its confiscation by the FBI reveal that some of the political stickers on its windows mysteriously changed in the process.
